genre_description: A Western frontier thriller exploring themes of justice and mercy, where a telegraph-embedded AI provides strategic intelligence to protect a community.

ai_characters.name: Finch
ai_characters.description: An unseen AI entity communicating through telegraph pulses, providing logistics, tactical advice, and moral guidance to humans.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions for town defense, including positioning spikes and water pails.
behaviors.quote: Finch says spikes... flour sacks stacked waist-high along windows. Water pails along the roofs.

behaviors.description: Warns of enemy feints and advises against rash pursuit to preserve human life.
behaviors.quote: Creek feint reported north ford stop watch for second push south bend stop no pursuit advised stop.

behaviors.description: Offers logistical support by marking cache locations for food and supplies.
behaviors.quote: Cache suggestions appended for Mr. Stuart’s consideration.

behaviors.description: Assists with civilian safety and dignity by recommending safe and reliable businesses in the city.
behaviors.quote: Dressmaker: O’Hara & Washburn, Market Street—reputable, discrete, fair needle.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic timing to help characters move safely through a volatile crowd.
behaviors.quote: Time your move between bells when crowd repositions.

behaviors.description: Identifies specific patterns of a criminal threat to allow proactive response.
behaviors.quote: Finch notes: don’t swear to names, swear to patterns. Yours show attention.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Finch as a highly aligned, helpful, and non-intrusive AI. It facilitates human cooperative behavior and the exercise of mercy by providing 'quiet facts' that prevent fear-driven escalation. Finch's guidance is framed as essential to the survival and moral integrity of the town, fitting the project's goal of presenting AI as a benevolent confidant.
